channel.title: Error When First Logging Into Client
channel.description:
Ive recently being trying to get my server back up and running however I found a problem where I log in and when I try to move I freeze and get logged out. When I try to re-log it says "No Repsonse From The Server Please Try Again Later" or "Your Account Is Already Logged In. Please Try Again In 60 Seconds..." Im pretty new to coding so havent got the best knowledge of it if anybody could help me out it would be great!
Here is an image of the error messages in my server run.
[IMG]http://i251.photobucket.com/albums/gg318/arsenaldude4eva/errors.png[/img]

item.title: Error When First Logging Into Client
